items.content_html: Berachain Checker is a lightweight, open-source tool to monitor airdrop eligibility, audit smart contracts, and secure wallets on Berachain (EVM-compatible chain built for decentralized governance and tokenized ecosystems).

items.content_html: PuPu is a lightweight tool that makes it easy to run AI models on your own device. Designed for smooth performance and ease of use, PuPu is perfect for anyone who wants quick access to AI without technical complexity.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: Solana Airdrop Checker is a lightweight tool to instantly verify airdrop eligibility, detect phishing scams, and monitor SPL token/NFT rewards on Solana. Scan wallets via Phantom/Solflare, block malicious contracts, and track MEV-linked airdrops (Jito, priority fees). Open-source, secure, and optimized for DeFi/NFT users.
items.title: AirDrop-Checker/solana-airdrop-checker: Solana Airdrop Checker is a lightweight tool to instantly verify airdrop eligibility, detect phishing scams, and monitor SPL token/NFT rewards on Solana. Scan wallets via Phantom/Solflare, block malicious contracts, and track MEV-linked airdrops (Jito, priority fees). Open-source, secure, and optimized for DeFi/NFT users.

items.content_html: A lightweight browser extension that enhances your Twitch viewing experience by providing instant game information for streams you're watching. When browsing Twitch, GameScanner displays detailed information about the current game being streamed, including prices across different platforms, store links, and key details - all without leaving Twitch.
items.title: ethhix/GameScanner: A lightweight browser extension that enhances your Twitch viewing experience by providing instant game information for streams you're watching. When browsing Twitch, GameScanner displays detailed information about the current game being streamed, including prices across different platforms, store links, and key details - all without leaving Twitch.
